artefact.overview: You need a licence to net for salmon and sea trout or fish for eels using nets, trawls or traps
artefact.licence_short_description: You need a licence to net for salmon and sea trout or fish for eels using nets, trawls or traps.
artefact.licence_overview:
To net for salmon and sea trout or fish for eels using nets, trawls or traps you need a licence from the [Environment Agency](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk "Environment Agency"){:rel="external"} in England and Wales, or permission from the relevant private land owner in Scotland. 

An Environment Agency consent is required to trap signal crayfish.
